text:
The celebrations have already begun at the Padukone house in Bengaluru. Deepika, who was spotted with mom at the Mumbai airport last night flew down to Bengaluru to officially kick-start the wedding celebrations.
For Deepika, the Nandi puja that is performed at the groom and bride's houses, a few days before the wedding took place today.
Pinterest
For the uninitiated, in Nandi Pooja, a coconut placed on top of a kalash (copper pot) filled with holy-water marks the start of the wedding celebrations. During this ceremony, the first invitation to the wedding is offered to God for seeking the blessings.
Twitter
Deepika's stylist Shaleena Nathani took to Instagram to share pictures from the Nandi puja. Donning a saffron Sabyasachi suit, Deepika looked super-happy as the bride-to-be.
